metadata.title: E33G Digital Nomad KITAS — Case Studies

case1_us_software_engineer.title: US Software Engineer — Remote for Big Tech
case1_us_software_engineer.notes: Reddito > USD 2.000/mese, assicurazione, prova alloggio; lavoro consentito SOLO per datore estero.

case3_low_income_not_eligible.title: Junior Designer — Income below threshold
case3_low_income_not_eligible.selectedOption: Not eligible for E33G (income below threshold)

visaOptions.option1: Increase income proof (>= USD 2,000/month) and reapply
visaOptions.option2: Consider C1 (no work) for ≤ 180‑day stays (not a substitute)

case3_low_income_not_eligible.notes: E33G richiede prova di lavoro estero + soglia reddito.

quickSummary.c1: E33G fits overseas employment with income ≥ USD 2,000/month
quickSummary.c2: Bali Zero: IDR 12.5M offshore / 14M onshore; MERP ~ USD 50
